Two users reused a prime when generating their RSA keys. Can you decrypt the intercepted message? Ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4616618979802572781723782664245984499252729823858399363017004482278812248818452757391591621473371993831319157034985621750281510892034762881061141142727068, ciphertext2: 9535954221470703859858556171642574174431410079496309133550491874918467169567164166401102235142299512644603182313471216527629403612936406254046424624924385

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7963741698612139101720555936806474035631458651031442705252141238031668979815816294140371913382431421456490280015839620968130857632118951623343218617382459, n2=10960837051202715456058546720381171252272718153676863102164296177224775289138280200226334787795349702422014646927618665390901532452998770998277727477448863, e=7450280148500573866337514617216940842724454168129242534419462411080560693448569994975347004801234409876369923966263545012304070569608724699644778626721739

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{mtnesj1w}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4616618979802572781723782664245984499252729823858399363017004482278812248818452757391591621473371993831319157034985621750281510892034762881061141142727068, ciphertext2: 9535954221470703859858556171642574174431410079496309133550491874918467169567164166401102235142299512644603182313471216527629403612936406254046424624924385
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7963741698612139101720555936806474035631458651031442705252141238031668979815816294140371913382431421456490280015839620968130857632118951623343218617382459, n2=10960837051202715456058546720381171252272718153676863102164296177224775289138280200226334787795349702422014646927618665390901532452998770998277727477448863, e=7450280148500573866337514617216940842724454168129242534419462411080560693448569994975347004801234409876369923966263545012304070569608724699644778626721739
extra_info: p=70480734423328504775106293046461334607800248158638420818229480863816797923901, q=112991752480607104236261828354838318112808529188314999610166732693285204902359, r=97005638115790227118859609959135761760196618921813242298200895069506095361657, φ(n1)=7963741698612139101720555936806474035631458651031442705252141238031668979815632821653467977773420053335088980363119012190783904211690555409786116614556200, φ(n2)=10960837051202715456058546720381171252272718153676863102164296177224775289138070202835738390463994580983700672847745660242791404211090403370514936177184848
